Replies.Reply: The rumors of my promiscuity have been greatly exaggerated.
Let the record show that I, Olive Penderghast, being of sound mind, ample breast size and the occasional corny knock knock joke, do enter this video blog into evidence in the case against me.
That's bullshit. There are lots of sexy Georges.
Shouldn't that alone be enough?
Okay. George... Ummmm... Reeves!
Superman. From way back. He was hot.
Bullshit. Ben Affleck played him in that movie!
George Stephanopolous.
George...
Well, mine is. So, I think we should just put this conversation to bed.
Let me back up. I don't know if any of you have ever met them, but Rhiannon's parents are quite possibly the creepiest people in a four county radius.
I've always felt sort of sorry for Rhiannon, but not enough to do what she was asking me to do.
Rhi, I can't. I told you I have plans.
I'm not lying. I promise I'm not.
No thank you, Mr. Abernathy.
Rhi, I like your parents. They're sweet. But I can't go camping this weekend.
I have a date.
No. I do.
You don't know him.
I'm serious. He goes to the community college with my brother in Denton.
Who? My brother?
Bunch'? Of course you haven't.
George Glass.
He's pretty hot and he asked me out this weekend, so I said yes.
Deal.
I'm sure you'll have a good time.
Even though we now hate each other, Rhi, I really hope you're watching this. Because this part's for you.
But on Monday, when Rhi asked me how my weekend was...
It was nothing short of perfection.
Ryan Gosling, definitely.
He was charming. A real gentleman.
Probably not. It was just one of those weekends.
Yeah.
No, of course not.
I did not.
I'm not that kind of girl.
Okay. Fine. We did it.
Rhi. Blowing Peter Tolliver once behind the Pizza Hut doesn't make you a super-slut.
I started piling on lie after lie.
It was... Normal. Nothing freaky.
No. It was great. Like I said.
So, how was your weekend?

Marianne Bryant, as we all know, is the President of the Christian Student Coalition and is that rare breed of human born with a stick the size of a baseball bat implanted up her anus. God's honest. I'm sure it's in some medical dictionary somewhere.
Last year's cause celebre was the changing of the school mascot, which she spearheaded.
Now, thankfully, we're the much less intimidating --
Meerkat.

Beats the hell out of me. But can we just take a moment to applaud the Barbara Bush High School Marching Band for their very ambitious effort to learn all of the James Bond theme music in a single year? I personally wish them all the best in their endeavor. Ku-dos!
School spirit.
Even dressed as a meerkat, I still fantasize about him.
Communists.
Isn't high school already a hotbed of just that?
that should be quickly expunged' -
Hey Marianne, can I talk to you for a second?
Who? The guidance counselor?
Oh, I have sixteen years worth of anecdotal proof that He does.
Damn it.
Did I just get saved?
I'm swell, guy-I've-never-laid-eyes-
Hey, you guys know that I was here all weekend, right?
And you would testify to that?
It's nothing. Just the rumor mill.
Seriously, it's nothing.
Why? He never comes home.
Like all families, mine has a deep dark secret. And since I'm spilling all this dirt, I might as well go ahead and confess it.

I'm trusting that this nugget of information isn't going to be spread around, but - okay, here it goes: My dad's name is Dill and my mother's name is Rosemary. They were so amused by this that they decided to name all of their children after --
-- edible items.
My brother's name is Sage and my sister's name is Ginger. It's shocking, I know. We're like a fucking pantry, us Penderghasts!

So, while I would never have classified myself as a wallflower, I was now the center of attention and who doesn't love that? Jeez, if I'd known that losing my virginity would create such a new persona for myself, I'd have lied about it back in eighth grade.

If I'd known that Meerkat Todd was going to turn out so hot, I probably would have cherished the moment more. I suppose just that I'm sitting here reminiscing about it means that it must have meant something.
Yeah, so anyway - kissing's not really my thing. That's what I learned in Natalie Giblin's closet.

So, I'm feeling like the cat's ass, because everyone thinks I've been deflowered. I'm surprised at how empowered I felt by this prevarication. I wonder to myself, would I feel this invigorated if I had actually let some college kid violate me in his cockroach-
Excuse me?
Perhaps you should GET a wardrobe, you twat!
Seems as if someone's practicing the mundane activities she'll be saddled with the rest of her pathetic life.
Wow, that's even bigger than your ass.
As long as you won't be there...
Why? Your parents didn't.
Olive Penderghast.
Well, to be perfectly honest - I've never used an epithet like this in an educational arena before. Sir.
what's the word I'm looking for?
As serious as a heart attack...
I always do. Are we finished?
Not even in a more positive capacity? Maybe I could win a ribbon or a medal or something. I could conceivably be valedictorian.
Yes, I'm a big whore.
It's not entirely true.
Look, there's something I need to tell you.
Never mind.
I want a car.
I got sent to the Principal today.
I used inappropriate language in English class. But we're reading a book that I, personally, deem wildly inappropriate for my age group, so I felt that it was actually quite apropos.
Let's just say it was an inappropriate word.
A snide comment from a snotty-ass girl in my class.
Oh. Yeah. T.
I don't even know what that means.
Noun. Definitely slang. Think British, although they pronounce it differently.
I can't. Too weird.
Now, THAT'S a challenge.
I'm spelling it out for you as quickly as I can.
The male equivalent.
What would my punishment have been otherwise?
But I'm already finished. Except for my helpful and profane peas.
Illegitimate Children of the Real Housewives of Laguna Beach' and I really only watched that as a joke.
Books? Computer?
All my homework's on there. Sorry.
I think we both are. I wouldn't know how to be grounded any more than you know how to ground.
You have no idea.
How's about I go and punish myself?
The next day, things took a turn for the scandalous. Which brings us to Part Three: A Lady's Choice and a Gentleman's Agreement.
Are these detention sessions often unchaperoned?
I see.
I was just thinking it's kind of funny. We haven't really talked since that closet incident back in eighth grade.
So, how have you been, Brandon?
Yikes.
Maybe your vandal is marvelling at your versatility?
Why?
So, the rumors are true, huh?
No. I meant about Gibbons being a facist.
You know, I read this article that said with this whole EMO movement, it looks like - that in a few years - the gay kids are going to be the most popular ones in school.
Can you imagine the dance squad full of shirtless guys in tight pants rocking out to Britney, while the football players sit on the sidelines wishing they were that cool?
Haven't you heard? I'm the new school slut!
No way. He's a freshman in college.
Ewwww. People suck.
He's not real. The guy I slept with. I made him up.
Indirectly? Sort of. Well, not really. No. No, I didn't.
Excuse me?
Did I say I wanted to be like them?
Why does it matter if it's not who I really am? No offense, Brando, but maybe you could learn something from me.

Calm down, Adolph. There's a vein popping out of your neck. I'm simply suggesting that maybe these kids we call peers have got the right idea. Maybe Bridget Schumacher isn't as hippy-dippy as she pretends to be. Maybe that's just the label she's put on herself to avoid having to bathe as often as society deems necessary. Or take Marianne Bryant. It's convenient for her to act like a stuck-up Jesus-freak.
No. I'm wrong. I think she's actually just a stuck-up Jesus-
Then maybe you need to go to that extreme. Or make the steadfast decision not to care. Even better if you can manage to do both.
I've discovered an infallible remedy for teen angst: apathy.
Don't they sort of go hand-in-hand?
How am I doing?
Not bad. For a fag.
If we really wanted to shock the world, we'd get up and leave detention.
Isn't going to stop me from telling everybody we did.
Well, I guess that's better than me getting crabs from a guy twice my age.
You know that Brandon kid?
The one and only. It's what somebody told him.
Isn't that sad? He's actually quite the conversationalist.
Since when are straight guys under the age of eighteen able to converse?
Shit. Hold on.
Hello?
Unfortunately so.
Speak of the devil...
Okay. Yeah. Sure.
Dude, that was Brandon. He wants to talk to me about something.
That's so mean.
Rhi, I told you. It was a one night stand. Which is now a DONE night stand.
If I was a character on a CW show, then, absolutely, I'd be blubbering all over my Teen Vogue. Hey, we should start a rumor that I'm having a pregnancy scare!
Oh happy day, Mama! I thought I was going to have to spend my dowry on booze and pills to numb the loneliness.
My mom's an acquired taste. I know this because I've only just recently begun to appreciate her myself.
Welcome to my boudoir! This is where the magic happens.
Brandon, just a few hours ago, you told me you were Kinsey Six gay.
Well, I didn't mean with me.
I should say not.
You're serious.
Oh my God, dude. You totally missed my point. All I was saying was that --
Brandon, I didn't REALLY have sex with a college guy. I just told people I did.
Well, actually, I just told one person and - well - you know how these things work.
Now, you're cooking with gas.
Oh no. Oh no no no no no no no no.
You are on crack.
This is not the answer. Why don't you just do what I did and make someone up?
I just don't think it would work.
I don't want your money.
So, if I say yes, you're going to tell a couple of people at school and I just have to go with it? I really don't think it will work.
I don't do anything half-assed.
It'll have to be a public event.
Afterwards, it's up to you. You're committing to something.
Just make sure you're ready to live with the consequences.
I'm sure you all remember the party...
OhmiGod, Melly. I hope you don't mind, but we had a few pre-cocktail party cocktails...
Party. Cocktails.
Soooo, here's the thing.
Brandon was in the middle of telling me this funny thing. Is there a quiet room we can go to where he can finish telling me --
-- About his thing? That's funny?
I love you. I love you so much.
Hey everybody!
Draw the shades.
Grunt. Make it really convincing.
Depends. Do you wanna be a normal adolescent boy or do you wanna be a stud?
Oh God, Brandon. Don't stop.
Now that I think about it, we probably don't want to do this for too long. It'll give the impression that you're having difficulty finishing. That's not the desired effect.
Of course I am!
Oh, fuck me! Fuck me! Don't stop fucking me!
Hold on.
Go forth, my son. You're a man now.
Is there a -- ?
Thanks.
Hi Todd.
I'M --
I'm here.
That rhymed.
I should probably go.
It was truly my Cindy Mancini moment.
Oh, Cindy Mancini. It could have been a lot worse. Trust me.
Put it on the pile of gifts from my other suitors.
A dyed-in-the-wool homosexual that boy is.
We're not dating, Mom.
Target.
Dear Olive, The dildo is just in case you don't shop at Target.
Your package was perfection!
Rhi?
such banalities. The one time I decide to step outside this convention... How are you?

Yes, Virginia, there is a Santa Claus. No, in fact, I do NOT know the way to San Jose. And - little known fact - contrary to popular belief, panama hats are not from Panama at all! They're from Ecuador! Who knew?
You're putting me in a precarious position, because --
Is that what people are saying happened?
Then I guess it's true.
God no.
Uh, thanks Mom. Good talk.
Y'know, you're really coming off as a little pious right now and you're kind of pissing me off.
Well, do YOU think I'm a cum dumpster?
First off, that's racist.
And you're a jealous virgin.
Yes! It's a period of time, how ever short, that I don't have to talk to you!
Rhiannon Abernathy only wishes that somebody wanted to pretend to sleep with her!
Hey, Anson.
I just realized the funniest thing.
Look it up, big boy.
Hi Evan.
Well, rest assured, it was equally as thrilling for me.
Walk away, Evan.
RUN away, Evan.
I'm about six seconds away from slapping you so hard that your unborn grandchildren will feel it.
Are you threatening me?
You're repugnant.
I want five hundred dollars in gift certificate form deposited in my locker before noon tomorrow.
It's fraw-TAHZH, dumbass.
Fine. But it was so good, you lasted only twelve seconds and I better not find out that little pecker of yours EVER came out of your pants. Take it or leave it.
I was too drunk to remember.
Two.
The sad thing is, Evan, if you had been a gentleman and asked me out on a date, I probably would have said yes.
Not now, I don't.
Evan, if you're watching this -
You wanted to see me?
Accessorizing?
Well, I'm really hoping to get an A.
Get it? Get it?
The rumors are true. I am, in fact, considering becoming an existentialist.
Geez, since when did teachers become privy to idle, adolescent gossip?
Have you ever decided just to play along? Because it's maybe easier than fighting tooth-and-nail to defend it?
damage you.
You know, I think you should give me extra credit for going the extra mile. I'm really attempting to understand this puritanical ostracism.
You know I won't tell.
Hey Mrs. Griffin.
A is for Awesome.
Your husband.
Am I in trouble? I promise the hem of my dress isn't higher than my fingertips.
If I open up to you, do you promise this stays in confidence?
tell anyone.
I have a reputation to uphold.
We done? If I can think of any angsty things to report, you'll be the first to know.
This has been so much fun that I'm actually - at this very moment -
I'm probably closer than either of us thinks...
Propho-tastic!
Puritanical and oppressive?
I don't need those.
Thank you.
You're up, hoss.
Let me guess: drugs.
I didn't know Christians believed in guidance counsellors.
Ooo! Ooo! Is your boyfriend struggling with his sexuality?
It's okay, Marianne.
Sometimes our boyfriend's parents get divorced. It's just important to know that it's not your fault.
I have to go now. Are you going to be okay?
Yeah. Everything's going to be okay.
Isn't that what we're supposed to do? Hey, it's your boss's rules.
Absolutely.
But then I unwittingly gave her boyfriend a venerial disease...
...And caused the break-up of Mr.
So, I guess I shouldn't be too shocked that these people wanted my diseased, home-wrecking ass out of there.

The funny thing is: the whole time this shit was going down - people calling me something I knew wasn't true, my best friend included - I couldn't help but think how I could have come up with better signs. No one even bothered to use alliteration or, God forbid, irony -
Forgive me, father, for I have sinned. I think that's how you're supposed to start these things.
It was make-believe and no one was getting hurt. But a lot of people hate me now. I kind of hate me, too.
Marys'? Hello?
Oh, come on!
Hi. I was wondering if the minister was around.
Actually, that would be fantastic!
Absolutely. I'm looking for a church to join and I thought he might be able to sell me on this fine establishment.
If everyone here is as friendly as you, I think we might be in business.
I'm new to the area. Looking for a church - hopefully something with a strong fellowship, a firm foot in the soil of...
divinity and was wondering what your church's stance on lying and adultery was?
Oh, I agree. Wholeheartedly. But tell me: assuming there is a hell --
Right. Okay. Let's say hell exists. Which is worse - lying or adultery? Or is lying about adultery like a double whammy?
You know what. I think I'm just going to go and check out Judaism.
The Jews and I have a lot in common. Fashion-wise. And stuff.
Yes. I had unwittingly sought advice from the father of the leader of my lynch mob. Who else can say that's happened to them?
As much as I want to say I hate Marianne. I don't. I get her.
Remember how I said that we were BFFs for, like, a day. Well, that's true. It was like we were sisters all of a sudden.
She wrote me a note in first period.
By second period, it was like we had private jokes.
Tragedy struck in third period.
He'll be okay.
Fourth period was when Marianne had office duty. Her duties included typing, stapling, filing and --
-- answering the phones.
Okay, I exaggerated. We were just BFFs for, like, a half-a-day.
MutherFUCKer!
Oh, grow up!
me.
Don't get me wrong. I love it, but I don't think you're supposed to use those words around a student.
You and -- Oh my God. I'm not judging you or anything, but oh my God.
Wait. What does that have to do with me?
I could have chlamydia. And I could easily have given it to Micah. That time we slept together. Who knows? Often times women don't have symptoms and I have been whoring around....
Call Micah. Tell him I said he's an asshole and that he owes me SO big for this and also the time I pretended not to see him during a third grade game of hide and seek.

And it's not really my place to say this, but I figure after the conversation we just had, I can speak candidly. Your husband is HOT and while the male adolescent can fuck like a bunny... who really wants to fuck a bunny? If I was you, I'd go home and seduce him and pretend this never happened.
No, you keep them.
So, really how could I be angry at Marianne?
Dude, if some bimbo gave MY boyfriend an STD, I'd have swung, but I'd have balled my fist.
My boyfriend.

With all the mythical play I was getting, it's a wonder - and probably a miracle - that I still hadn't actually been asked out on a real date. Guys were clamoring to claim that they'd slept with me, but no one was putting the real moves on me. Until finally...
It was really Rhiannon who had a crush on him. She has since we were kids.
What did you have in mind?
Why, Anson, are you inviting me to accompany you to a romantic dinner at the Red Lobster?
Nice. Yeah. I'll have dinner with you.
I can't believe you brought me to the nicest restaurant in town.
I think Anson Jr. doesn't mind making the sacrifice. You don't mind that I named him Anson Jr., do you?
Do you believe this whole thing about lobster being an aphrodisiac?

Y'know, medical science has not substantiated claims that any particular food increases sexual desire or performance. It's so funny when guys ply women with food that they think is gonna get them laid. I mean, what's really sexy about slurping back oysters? You know, native people believed that you gained the strength of the animal by consuming it. Some people grind up rhinoceros horn, because it's thought to stiffen the male sex organ. It's all bullshit.
Yum!
I didn't know Meerkat Todd worked here! And he's a lobster! I wonder if I should start calling him Lobster Todd.
Shit!
Rhiannon's over there.
So? She's been in love with you since the first grade.
Well, she's my best friend.
We're not, but it doesn't mean I should be out with you.
I don't know. You asked me out?
She can't see us.
Would you mind?
I just remembered I'm allergic to shellfish. I always forget that my respiratory system would collapse and I'd die. It sucks I know.
Let me get it. I have a gift certificate.
And I ruined it, so let me bear the financial brunt.
I'm so sorry about this. But she really likes you.
And you and I do?
Yeah, well, if that's our magical connection, I should date the entire school.
Yeah, about that --
Keep it. Tip.
Oh. I didn't realize --
Okay. So, what did we "do" on this date?
Wait. This isn't how it works. I don't actually --
You don't get it. I'm not technically having sex with people for money. You know that, right?
Dude, I gotta go. It's been --
No thanks.
Fuck.
Hey Todd.
Oh, I'm just hanging out in the parking lot. I do that sometimes.
Nah. I'm fine.
She's not my friend anymore.
What's to say? I'm a horrible person. Everyone thinks I'm a whore and, for the first time, I'm starting to believe it.
Oh, don't act like you don't know what people are saying about me.
Why not?
Who told you?
You remember that?
And look how he turned out.
Yeah? Who was?
What!?
She knew how I felt about you!
She did it first! And here I am feeling SOOOO bad and THAT BITCH!
Felt! I said FELT!
I mean, it's not that I don't still feel that way.

No. Not tonight. I don't want you to kiss me when mascara's running down my cheek or some shithead has forced his tongue down my throat only a half-hour ago. I've wanted to kiss you since the eighth grade, but I want it to be perfect. And right now, my life's a mess. I need to get it under control before I drag you into it.
Now I have a reason to fix this catastrophe I've brought upon myself. And I'm going to.
You see, now I had a reason for things to go back to the way that they were.

The truth needed to be told and I knew I had to go the one person who could help me. The one person I could count on to set the story straight. Brandon. I'd helped him and, even though it would destroy his new reputation for being a stud, I knew he would help me.
My apologies to Mark Twain.
Nothing.
No telephone, no television, no computer, no internet and - most importantly - no diseased sexual partners.
I went to everyone I'd helped and begged them to say it wasn't true.
Please, Evan.
Or I could just tell everyone THE TRUTH.
With all due respect, Mrs. Griffin, you're a fucking cunt.
Your wife has chlamydia and she's been sleeping with a student and she gave it to him and now she's trying to blame me.
I -- I'm sorry. I --
Looking back, that's the thing I regret the most. That's the thing that sent me to the church, er, churches. And that's the thing that made me realize how profoundly I'd fucked up.
And that's something I'll have to live with for the rest of my life.
I'm so sorry.
Me too. Where are you going?
Can I come?

Mr. Griffin, if you ever see this, just know - I was wrong to tell you that. In that way. At all. I don't know. I shouldn't have done it. I don't feel bad for lying for your wife. But I hate myself for telling you the truth. I'm so sorry.
Part Five: Not With a Whimper But With a Bang.
Oh fuck me.
So, now everyone who knows the truth is either gone or won't fess up. The Cross Your Legs Club is demanding my head. And the messed up thing is that I wouldn't put it past Gibbons to expel me.
Everyone called you a whore?
Mom!
Ewwww!
Why are you telling me this?
I promise that it was no worse than Marianne Bryant's attack on me.
Wait, what?
That's disgusting! He's disgusting!
So, the sins of the mother are revisited on the daughter.
I hate you so much right now.
Thanks for the pep talk, Mom. Now get out. I need to make some phone calls.
Nobody does it better.
I wasn't lookin,' But somehow they found me.
And nobody does it better Though sometimes I wish someone could.
The way that they hold me Whenever they hold me There's some kind of magic inside you.

Nobody does it half as good as me.
Baby you're the best!
or watch me do one.
